title.rendered: We are thrilled to announce the successful 2nd Monitoring Visit of our project “Tourism for the Future

content.rendered:
Our team had a productive session, reviewing the project’s progress and discussing its relevance, design, efficiency, effectiveness, impact, cross-border effects, and sustainability. We also addressed any challenges and outlined corrective measures to ensure the project’s success.
 
The monitoring visit was conducted by the Joint Technical Secretariat (JTS), the responsible body for monitoring projects under the IPA II CBC Programme Montenegro – Kosovo 2014-2020. As part of the JTS, the assigned representative provided valuable support and oversight for our project, “Tourism for the Future”.
 
This project, under the IPA Cross-Border Cooperation Programme Montenegro – Kosovo 2014-2020, is a significant step towards fostering sustainable tourism and strengthening our regional cooperation. 
 
Stay tuned for more updates as we continue to work towards a brighter future in tourism!
